question: Which bank has decided to introduce digital payment security control directions for regulated entities to improve the security of digital payment channels and also to improve the consumer service?
explanation: RBI decided to introduce digital payment security control directions for regulated entities to improve the security of digital payment channels and also to improve the consumer service.The Directions propose the setting up of robust governance structure. It includes digital payments, implement common minimum standards of security controls such as mobile banking, internet, card payments. It will bring upon standards on channels such as mobile banking, internet and card payment.
